title: How to Change Your Username in Minecraft: Complete Guide

steps.title: Go to https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/login and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/login and log in. This is the official Minecraft website. If you're playing the Java version of the game, you'll be able to change your username on this site. [1] X Research source There are a couple time limitations for usernames: You can only change your username once every 30 days. And, you can't change your username if your account was made in the last 30 days. Changing your in-game username does not change your Minecraft website profile name.

steps.title: Click My Games.
steps.content: Click My Games . This option appears in the left menu of your profile page, under your account name.

steps.title: Click Profile Name under "Minecraft:
steps.content: Click Profile Name under "Minecraft: Java Edition." This will open a new page for changing your in-game username. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Type a new username under "Java Profile Name."
steps.content: Type a new username under "Java Profile Name." Note that there are a few requirements for usernames: It needs to have 3 to 16 characters. You can't use spaces between the characters. You can use uppercase and lowercase A through Z, 0 through 9, and underscores (_). The username can't already be in use by another player.

steps.title: Click Change Profile Name.
steps.content: Click Change Profile Name . This will confirm your username change. Now you're ready to get back to making cool houses and finding the End Portal . [3] X Research source Your previous username will be saved for 37 days, giving you a week after the 30-day wait period to switch back to your old username before it can be used by someone else.

steps.title: Go to https://social.xbox.com/changegamertag and log in to your Microsoft account.
steps.content: Go to https://social.xbox.com/changegamertag and log in to your Microsoft account. This is the official website for changing your Xbox username. If you're playing the Bedrock version of the game, your in-game username is your Xbox gamertag. Even the most seasoned gamer occasionally needs to change their Gamertag! [4] X Research source

steps.title: Type in a new Gamertag next to "Your new gamertag."
steps.content: Type in a new Gamertag next to "Your new gamertag." Your gamertag can be between 1 and 12 characters (including spaces). It can't begin with a number. [5] X Research source Take your time and try different wordings to get a good Xbox Gamertag .

steps.title: Click Check availability.
steps.content: Click Check availability . If you see a message saying the Gamertag is taken, you'll need to modify it until it's accepted. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click Claim it.
steps.content: Click Claim it . This will confirm the Gamertag change. [7] X Research source
